content.text:
# List of presidents of the Maldives by age

This is the List of the Presidents of the Maldives by age. In the table below, their age at the start of their presidency is labeled as their age when they were inaugurated and their age at the end of their presidency is when their successor was inaugurated.
Age of the presidents of the Maldives
The current President of the Maldives, Mohamed Muizzu's age is 45, and he is also the youngest president in Maldivian history, while former president Maumoon Abdul Gayoom is the oldest former president alive in Maldivian history.
